TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XPathMessageQueryCollection extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQueryCollection

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about message queries, see the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQuery> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQueryCollection> classes.
## Examples The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. The queries are evaluated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery> objects contained in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageQueryCollection> object. The results of each query are tested using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult.ResultType%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult> class.
[!code-csharp[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathmessagequery/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathmessagequery/vb/source.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQuery, !!TResult>> Evaluate<TResult>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: The type of the object to return.
Docs.summary: Runs a query against the message. The body cannot be queried.
Docs.returns: An enumerable collection of results that satisfy the query.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQuery, !!TResult>> Evaluate<TResult>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer buffer) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: The type of result to return.
Docs.summary: Runs an XPath query against the message.
Docs.returns: An enumerable collection of results that satisfy the query.
